SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.jetty.session

Class SessionContext

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.session.SessionContext
public class SessionContext extends Object
SessionContext Information about the context to which sessions belong: the Context, the SessionManager of the context, and the unique name of the node. A SessionManager is 1:1 with a SessionContext.
